about_the_game:
Indie game Ballad of Bravos: Jiangchengzi is open to the public!

Join more than 10+ heroes and heroines with their own unique characteristics to fight the Huiguis (evil demons) and pursue the path of true chivalry!

Otherworldly oriental mythological fantasy, romance role-playing single player turn-based battle game.

Easy and fun turn-based battles and an exciting storyline.

Battle with raidable and loveable characters to reach an ending that is all your own!

Fantasy rivers and lakes, the journey of immortal cultivation opens

Ballad of Bravos: Jiangchengzi is a unique role-playing game incorporating elements of immortal cultivation and martial arts, taking you deep into an oriental fantasy world full of passion and danger. Here there are not only the grandeur of heroic warriors, but also the entanglement of love and hatred. Every mountain and river and every monument here contains unknown dangers and chances, waiting for you to explore and conquer.

In the world, you will experience the growth path of a cultivator, face countless tests and choices, challenge powerful demons and ghosts, explore hidden cave relics, and get acquainted with a group of loyal and side-by-side companions, and gradually become a respected legend in the jianghu. Or is it to turn against the enemy, to degrade oneself, to become the absolute villain who does not do any evil?

The realm of Yunyang, where opportunities and challenges exist side by side

You, as an exceptionally gifted young man [Chi], enter the ancient and mysterious land of [Yunyang] by chance. Yunyang is full of valiant and heroic warriors, these practitioners are skilled and proud of their chivalry, and take it as their duty to get rid of unclean spirits. Here, you can enhance your own cultivation through hard training under the guidance of Master [Cang] of the Fiery Sun Sect, from basic boxing and kicking kung fu to the subtle internal gong and mind techniques, each step of the way will bring you closer to the peak. You can travel among the great sects, participate in their disputes and alliances, and experience danger and skill with the famous warriors and heroes of the world.

Fateful choices, the achievement of the exclusive legend

In this world, every small choice can have far-reaching consequences. You can go deep into the underground seedbed and expose the secrets of the evil sects; or in the name of morality and righteousness, you can crusade against the lurking demons and evil things; or you can manoeuvre among the chaotic forces of the Jianghu and help the different sects to achieve their goals. Each choice will affect your destiny and leave a unique legend in the world.

Fighting side by side, bonds and blood are the same.

Ballad of Bravos: Jiangchengzi weaves a heart-wrenching multi-ending main plot for you, complemented by rich side quests and a partner system, where you'll fight side by side with the great warriors in a common crusade against the Huiguis and other potential enemies. The many companions have unique personalities and stories, and they will bond with you and become close companions on your adventures. In this mysterious and vast world, your emotions, righteousness and power will grow with the development of the story and write your own chapter of true love and righteousness.

content_descriptors.notes: 此游戏包含成人主题和内容，可能不适合所有年龄段的人。这些主题包括裸露面积较大的服装。

You will embark on a journey full of adventures, get to know fierce warriors, cultivate yourself in the midst of love and hatred, and fightto crusade against the evil demons.
